description: This file is a test specification for the AppComponent in an Angular project. It uses Angular's testing utilities to verify that the component creation, title property, and rendering behave as expected.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: The primary component being tested in this specification.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the testing module with AppComponent before each test.

methods.name: it should create the app
methods.description: Test to verify that AppComponent can be instantiated.

methods.name: it should have the 'angular' title
methods.description: Test to verify that the component's title property equals 'angular'.

methods.name: it should render title
methods.description: Test to verify that the component correctly renders the title in the DOM.
